title: Did Trump ask Obama to resign after the Ebola doctor returned to the United States?
subtitle: "We all lose when we allow irrational fear, fuelled in part by rush-time classifications and political convenience, to overcome practical preparedness for public health," later written by the doctor.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: In October 2014, Donald Trump tweeted that US President Barack Obama should resign because the doctor who treated Ebola patients in Guinea returned to the United States.
